classifiers: license :: osi approved :: gnu general public license (gpl)
description: mercurial is a distributed scm tool written in python. it is used by a number of large projects that require fast, reliable distributed revision control, such as mozilla.

name: mercurial
summary: fast scalable distributed scm (revision control, version control) system
